```{r echo = FALSE}
library(leaflet)
set.seed(2016-04-25)
df <- data.frame(
  lat = c(19.175784,19.038905,19.081206,19.027007,19.063823),
  lng = c(72.966613,72.845335,72.837105,72.845117,72.835776),
  popup_text = c("Neelam Nagar: 8 years","Victory House: 10 years","Podar: 6 years","Ruparel: 2 years","TSEC: 4 years"))

df %>% 
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(
    lng = ~lng,
    lat = ~lat,
    popup = ~popup_text
  )
```
